text: Janeshwar Mishra Park is an urban park in Lucknow, India. The largest public park in the country. ==Features== The park boasts the following features: * Green belt spread across the park. * Lakes * Sports centre and playground * Gymnasium * Cycle track * Jogging track * Theme park * Lawns * Gondola * Water bodies recharged through Rain water harvesting * Entire park is solar powered. ==References== Category:Parks in India Category:National symbols of India Category:Lucknow
title: Janeshwar Mishra Park
